name: List Files
info:
# List files

Will list files in a directory.

Path can be set in `msg.payload` or by setting the `DIRECTORY` environment variable.

Extensions can be filtered by settings the `EXTENSIONS` environment variable to an Array of extensions.

name: create exec cmd
func:
msg.payload = `wget --quiet --save-cookies /tmp/cookies.txt --keep-session-cookies --no-check-certificate 'https://docs.google.com/uc?export=download&id=${msg.gdrive.id}' -O- | sed -rn 's/.*confirm=([0-9A-Za-z_]+).*/\\1\\n/p'`

/*msg.payload = `wget --load-cookies /tmp/cookies.txt \
"https://docs.google.com/uc?export=download&confirm=$(wget --quiet --save-cookies /tmp/cookies.txt --keep-session-cookies --no-check-certificate 'https://docs.google.com/uc?export=download&id=${gdriveId}' -O- | sed -rn ${regex})&id=${gdriveId}" \
-O /tmp/${gdriveFilename} \
&& rm -rf /tmp/cookies.txt \
&& unzip /tmp/${gdriveFilename} -d /tmp`
*/
return msg;

name: create exec cmd
create exec cmd
func:
msg.payload = `unzip "/tmp/${msg.gdrive.name}" -d /tmp/explode/`

return msg;

command: pkill -o chromium ; pkill -o pqiv ; pkill -o vlc
name: Kill ALL
set folder to delete
set msg.(azione cmd)
set msg.topic
func:
msg.topic = "UPDATE sistema set VIDEO='0', LAST='null'";
return msg;

name: set msg.topic
func:
msg.topic = "UPDATE sistema set VIDEO='" + msg.cmd + "', WEB='0', PLIST='0', PDF='0', IMAGE='0', LAST='VIDEO|" + msg.cmd + "'";
return msg;

name: set msg.topic
func:
msg.topic = "UPDATE sistema SET VIDEO='" + msg.cmd + "', WEB='0', PLIST='0',IMAGE='0', LAST='VIDEO|" + msg.cmd + "'";
return msg;

func:

name: set video path msg.payload
func:
msg.payload = env.get('DIRECTORY') + `"${msg.cmd}"`;
return msg;

name: set msg(azione interval cmd)
set msg.topic
func:
msg.topic = "UPDATE sistema set PDF='" + msg.cmd + "', WEB='0', PLIST='0', IMAGE='0', VIDEO='0', LAST='PDF|" + msg.cmd + "|" + msg.interval + "'";
return msg;

name: set msg.topic

return msg;

MONITOR
info:
# Payload Valori ammissibili
` # Monitor ON `  
` [{"id":"MONITOR","v":"1"}] `  
  
` # Monitor OFF`  
` [{"id":"MONITOR","v":"0"}] `

name: ROTAZIONE
info:
# Payload Valori ammissibili
` # Rotazione default`  
`[{"id":"ROTAZIONE","v":"NORMAL"}]`  
  
` # Rotazione Destra`  
`[{"id":"ROTAZIONE","v":"DX"}]`
  
` # Rotazione Sinistra`  
`[{"id":"ROTAZIONE","v":"SX"}]`

name: KIOSK
info:
# Payload Valori ammissibili
` # Kiosk ON NO-Refresh`  
` [{"id":"WEB","v":"1|https://www.smeup.com"}] `  

` # Kiosk ON AutoRefresh `  
` [{"id":"WEB","v":"1|https://www.smeup.com|1"}] `  

` # Kiosk OFF `  
` [{"id":"WEB","v":"0"}] `

name: YT PLAYLIST
info:
# Payload Valori ammissibili
` # Youtube Playlist ON `  
` [{"id":"PLIST","v":"<idPlaylist>"}] `  
  
` # Youtube Playlist OFF`  
` [{"id":"PLIST","v":"0"}] `

name: IMAGE
info:
# Payload Valori ammissibili
` # Immagini Tutte `  
` [{"id":"IMAGE","v":"1|ALL|<tempoVisualizzazione>"}] `  
` [{"id":"IMAGE","v":"1|ALL|5"}] `  
    
` # Immagini Singole `  
` [{"id":"IMAGE","v":"1|<nomeFile>|<tempoVisualizzazione>"}] `
` [{"id":"IMAGE","v":"1|immagine1.png|5"}] `

` # Immagini Off `  
` [{"id":"IMAGE","v":"0|<nomeFile>|<tempoVisualizzazione>"}] `
` [{"id":"IMAGE","v":"0||"}] `

name: VIDEO
info:
# Payload Valori ammissibili
` # Video Tutti `  
` [{"id":"VIDEO","v":"1|ALL|<tempoVisualizzazione>"}] `  
` [{"id":"VIDEO","v":"1|ALL|5"}] `  
    
` # Video Singolo `  
` [{"id":"VIDEO","v":"1|<nomeFile>|<tempoVisualizzazione>"}] `
` [{"id":"VIDEO","v":"1|video1.mp4|5"}] `

` # Video Off `  
` [{"id":"VIDEO","v":"0|<nomeFile>|<tempoVisualizzazione>"}] `
` [{"id":"VIDEO","v":"0||"}] `

name: CRON
info:
# Payload Valori ammissibili
` # Single Cron `  
` [{"id":"CRON","v":"1|[<cron command>]"}] `  
` [{"id":"CRON","v":"1|[5 * * * * /bin/bash && /bin/sh]"}] `  

` # Multiple Cron `  
` [{"id":"CRON","v":"1|[5 * * * * /bin/bash script1]|[15 * * * * /bin/sh script2]"}] `   
  
` # Clear Cron `  
` [{"id":"CRON","v":"0"}] `

name: CRON - Clear
info:
# Payload Valori ammissibili
` # Single Cron `  
` [{"id":"CRON","v":"1|[<cron command>]"}] `  
` [{"id":"CRON","v":"1|[5 * * * * /bin/bash && /bin/sh]"}] `  

` # Multiple Cron `  
` [{"id":"CRON","v":"1|[5 * * * * /bin/bash script1]|[15 * * * * /bin/sh script2]"}] `   
  
` # Clear Cron `  
` [{"id":"CRON","v":"0"}] `
